title: Google\Cloud\DataCatalog\V1\ColumnSchema
name: ColumnSchema
description:
Representation of a column within a schema. Columns could be nested inside other columns.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datacatalog.v1.ColumnSchema

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.description
params.description: Optional. Description of the column. Default value is an empty string.

params.name: data.mode
params.description: Optional. A column's mode indicates whether the values in this column are required, nullable, etc. Only NULLABLE, REQUIRED and REPEATED are supported. Default mode is NULLABLE.

params.name: data.subcolumns
params.description: Optional. Schema of sub-columns. A column can have zero or more sub-columns.
